channel.title: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers
channel.description:
In addition to our amazing guests ([check out this thread](https://discourse.funtimers.club/t/the-big-gauntlet-con-2019-guests-thread/3113/)), we have a lot of prolific, talented designers coming to Gauntlet Con, bringing scenarios, settings, and systems they've created.
During the week, I'm going to introduce you to some of them in this thread!

item.title: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Jacob Wood, Accessible Games

@Jacob_Wood of Accessible Games will be running Survival of the Able , an upcoming survival horror RPG using the Fudge™ System in which you play as someone with a disability living in the period of the Black Death.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LohJbt_qkONJIdev9yc

Michael G. Barford

@Michael_G_Barford will be running a playstorming session for 108 Stars of Destiny.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpMYk3NXnUBqR0YPR81

Michael Dunn-O’Connor

@Michael will be running his game Mutagen Trail.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoMUa4Ivli9VM6rmhdH

Jeff Barber, Biohazard Games

Jeff of Biohazard Games will be running their game Blue Planet.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoH5fMXEm6KMUySijBE

Tomer Gurantz

@tomes will be running The Outsiders, a Descended from the Queen game.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpFXeP3x9MglswrJ6oc

Dexter Duckworth

@dexter will be running a playtest of his game The Fleet.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpToJG-kjM-xKLfj09Y

Jamila R. Nedjadi, Sword Queen Games

Jamila R. Nedjadi will be running their own game BALIKBAYAN: Returning Home. Find them on Twitter .
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp8BwEHfsTkDJGS3fgo

Richard Ruane

Wait, I’m here again! I’ll be running my teenager fantasy intrigue setting Barrow Keep as an experimental Troika! hack.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpUs12hkabLMO9qx0ik

Justin Kahler

Justin (of Sweater Punk Studios) will be running his recently crowdfunded mecha game Beamswords & Bazookas.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo1UckIpiRtPHy4etEA

Read full topic
item.source: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers

item.title: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

On Saturday of Gauntlet Con (2019-10-26T04:00:00Z), we have our biggest set of games and biggest set of volunteer GM-Designers!

Jacob Wood, Accessible Games

@Jacob_Wood of Accessible Games will be running Survival of the Able, an upcoming survival horror RPG using the Fudge™ System in which you play as someone with a disability living in the period of the Black Death.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LohIXlQ0yn7MFor1Uyd

Sean F. Smith

@seanFsmith’s will run his Quarrel & Fable system and lead you through one of the all-time most famous adventures in RPG history.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnsqflDktG5HrpxuSB7

Charles Simon

@umbralAeronaut will be running his Forged in the Dark game Hello, World.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lnx_8pp6hj3DtOGR6JA
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LowmJwNu3P6k44i2QrK

Tomer Gurantz

@tomes will be running The Outsiders, a Descended from the Queen game.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpFXPjVFPjN81e9UN3q

Dexter Duckworth

@dexter will be running a playtest of his game The Fleet.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpTjLzwepKkoMHiEnDi

Justin Ford

Justin F. is running his Dungeon World funnel “The King Beneath the Castle,” from the same anthology of DW funnels as Saviors of Hogtown (see above). Check out his work on Itch.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo1EduRDgvSP8X1MXni

Michael Dunn-O’Connor

@Michael will be running his game Picaresque.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoMQPptwNpE_5X0ar-8

Alexi Sargeant, Cloven Pine Games

Alexi Sargent, aka @Alexi_Sarge on the forums, is running his game Autumn Triduum. Check out Cloven Pine Games on Itch.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoN9STv2L6HnuqRmQaf

Gilbert S.

Gilbert S. is running his playtest game Generations: A Home Among the Stars.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoMoFZQS8t0IqQOXGco

Darren Brockes

@darren will continue his series of his game HILT // BLADE.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lniz_F-gVT2K3O96ONC

Adam Robichaud

Adam will run his game Poutine.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp3tu9_6jtDZfmzoCpT

Jamila R. Nedjadi, Sword Queen Games

Jamila R. Nedjadi will be running their own game BECOME ONE: Protect the Pilot.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpDWliRGIlpfovD0jqv

Richard Ruane

Hey that’s me - I’ll be running my setting Moonlight on Roseville Beach for @Diogo_Nogueira’s Dark Streets & Darker Secrets.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpV6MtkgyJjZrKsOHfE

Rory MacLeod

@RoryM will continue the series of his game [Infinite Galaxies]
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNnHLoyg3wHU3276l4

Like I said, Saturday is our busiest day! If you’re a volunteer creator-GM (other than an official guest), let me know if I left you out.

Read full topic
item.source: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers

item.title: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Here’s a few more creator-run games from our volunteer GMs. All of these are running on Friday, Oct. 25!

Pam Punzalan

First thing on Friday (at least in US Timezones), Pam Punzalan will run her game Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites, available from her Itch store.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp7jew153_BgGNYZ30a

Jim Crocker

Jim Crocker (@JimLikesGames) of Jim Likes Games, the official game retailer of Gauntlet Con, will run his Trophy RPG incursion, “The Flocculent Cathedral” from Codex: Hunger.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnziUr__3hhC3x_Lb3P

Rich Rogers

@RichRogers of the +1 Forward podcast will run his game Hit the Streets.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoHeFBSyllPENti2mLN

Michael G. Barford

@Michael_G_Barford, who appeared on Discern Realities, runs the Mandatory Fun Club GM training program, and has written for the blog, will be running a playstorming session, mashing up ideas from The World of Darkness and Numenera.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpMUcJ0TWPNns5g84ct

Darren Brockes

@darren, recently on The Gauntlet Podcast, will be running his game HILT // BLADE.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnizNv_OIHOKSZnSfvv

Michael Dunn-O'Connor

@Michael will be running his game Picaresque.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoMQ5zayFkVBUBS9A3p

Tyler Lominack

@Tylom, from the May-2-2018 and April-10-2019 episodes of The Gauntlet Podcast, will run his storygame “Fire Ships at Midnight” from Codex: Flame.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpBhNbW8wK9BWKgI66d

Rory MacLeod

Rory MacLeod, who’s appeared on +1 Forward, will be running his game Infinite Galaxies.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNmzMZVXK7MSNe_4cK

Zander MacDonald

Zander MacDonald will be bringing a playtest of his game The Survivors.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo5ERMHyKBmbADDJIjr

Read full topic
item.source: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers

item.title: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Starting on Thursday, Oct. 24, you can play games with:

Michael G. Barford

Michael Barford (@Michael_G_Barford here on the forums) will be offering a workshop on hacking his game “Storm Riders!” from Codex: Joy 2. https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpL7n-QjZ3jhdMXv1tk

Bethany Harvey

Bethany Harvey will be running their game Unincorporated. Check out their store on Itch.

Jamila R. Nedjadi, Sword Queen Games

Jamila R. Nedjadi will be running their own game BALIKBAYAN: Returning Home. Find them on Twitter.

Alexi Sargent, Cloven Pine Games

Alexi Sargent (@Alexi_Sarge here on the forums) is running his “Rogues of Ravnica” adventure for Dungeon World. Check out Cloven Pine Games on Itch.

Justin F., Moth-Lands

Justin F. is running his Dungeon World funnel “Saviors of Hogtown”. Check out his work on Itch.

Pam Punzalan

Pam Punzalan will run her game Sundo , available from her Itch store.
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp7ixTvXyhsszdKN3Xo

Read full topic
item.source: A Big Gauntlet Con 2019 Thread: Thank you to these Designer/GM Volunteers
